bike.description: Specialized FACT 6r carbon, triple monocoque construction, compact design, Zertz seatstay inserts

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon monocoque construction with Zertz inserts
Specialized Mindset, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, sealed cartridge bearings, carbon 20mm cone with two 5mm alloy spacers
Specialized Pro-Set lightweight stem, 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt 31.8mm bar clamp, 4-position adjustable
Specialized Zertz Pro handlebar, racing drop, 31.8 clamp
Body Geometry Bar Phat, cork ribbon with 2.5mm gel padding
FSA SL-K MegaExo, 2-piece carbon compact crankset
FSA integrated, alloy exterior cartridge bearings
Specialized All Condition Pro, 700 x 23c, aramid bead, 120TPI
Specialized All Condition Pro, 700 x 23c, aramid bead, 120TPI
Body Geometry Avatar, microfiber cover, gel padding
Specialized Pavé FACT carbon seatpost with Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
